user_input: Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios using the NT, NT_HE, and NT_LE scenarios for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request to generate profiles using NT, NT_HE, and NT_LE scenarios across the specified years.

tasks.description: Split the nodes from the generated profiles according to the provided node splitting rules.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Use the predefined node splitting rules to separate the generated demand profiles into distinct nodes.

tasks.description: Convert the resulting hourly demand profiles into the TST format for the TYNDP study team.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request to convert the hourly hydrogen demand profiles into the TST format for the TYNDP study team.
